SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SS.Name, CC.Name, AA.OrderDate, AA.OrderNo) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.OrderDate , AA.OrderNo , AA.StoreID , AA.ChannelID , CC.Name as ChannelName , AA.MemberID , MM.Name as MemberName , AA.TotalOrderQty , AA.TotalOrderAmt , AA.TotalDiscountAmt , AA.TotalCouponAmt , AA.TotalDeliveryFee , AA.TotalSupplyAmt , AA.Status , M1.Name as StatusName , AA.Description FROM dbo.TOrder AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TStore SS WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.StoreID = SS.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TMember MM WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.MemberID = MM.ID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Status = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'OrderStatus' WHERE AA.OrderDate > DATEADD(DAY, -1, #StartDate#) AND AA.OrderDate < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #EndDate#)
AND AA.StoreID = #StoreID#
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
AND AA.MemberID = #MemberID#
AND AA.Status = #Status#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.* , MM.Name as MemberName , CC.Name as ChannelName
FROM dbo.TOrder AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TMember MM WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.MemberID = MM.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

INSERT INTO dbo.TOrder ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, OrderDate, OrderNo, StoreID, ChannelID, MemberID, BillingAddressID, ShippingAddressID, TotalOrderQty, TotalOrderAmt, TotalDiscountAmt, TotalCouponAmt, TotalDeliveryFee, TotalSupplyAmt, Description, Status ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #OrderDate#, #OrderNo#, #StoreID#, #ChannelID#, #MemberID#, #BillingAddressID#, #ShippingAddressID#, #TotalOrderQty#, #TotalOrderAmt#, #TotalDiscountAmt#, #TotalCouponAmt#, #TotalDeliveryFee#, #TotalSupplyAmt#, #Description#, #Status# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TOrder SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, OrderDate = #OrderDate# , OrderNo = #OrderNo# , StoreID = #StoreID# , ChannelID = #ChannelID# , MemberID = #MemberID# , BillingAddressID = #BillingAddressID# , ShippingAddressID = #ShippingAddressID# , TotalOrderQty = #TotalOrderQty# , TotalOrderAmt = #TotalOrderAmt# , TotalDiscountAmt = #TotalDiscountAmt# , TotalCouponAmt = #TotalCouponAmt# , TotalDeliveryFee = #TotalDeliveryFee# , TotalSupplyAmt = #TotalSupplyAmt# , Description = #Description# , Status = #Status# WHERE ID = #ID#

UPDATE AA SET AA.TotalOrderQty = ISNULL(BB.TotalOrderQty, 0) , AA.TotalOrderAmt = ISNULL(BB.TotalOrderAmt, 0) , AA.TotalDiscountAmt = ISNULL(BB.TotalDiscountAmt, 0) , AA.TotalCouponAmt = ISNULL(BB.TotalCouponAmt, 0) , AA.TotalDeliveryFee = ISNULL(BB.TotalDeliveryFee, 0) , AA.TotalSupplyAmt = ISNULL(BB.TotalSupplyAmt, 0) FROM dbo.TOrder AA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT OrderID , SUM(OrderQty, 0) as TotalOrderQty , SUM(OrderAmt, 0) as TotalOrderAmt , SUM(DiscountAmt, 0) as TotalDiscountAmt , SUM(CouponAmt, 0) as TotalCouponAmt , SUM(DeliveryFee, 0) as TotalDeliveryFee , SUM(SupplyAmt, 0) as TotalSupplyAmt FROM dbo.TOrderItem WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE OrderID = #ID# GROUP BY OrderID ) BB ON AA.ID = BB.OrderID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
